messages.content: At this SNP conference, as with every other, the voice of East Lothian was heard. Whether you've supported the SNP all your life, or like me made the journey to join, or if you can simply no longer stomach Labour who've let both Scotland and you down. Now you can help. The SNP need only XXX votes to win East Lothian. You can make the difference. Now's the time for all YES voters, SNP supporters and for aspirational Labour and Liberals to unite. Vote for Kenny MacAskill, vote for your country, vote SNP for East Lothian.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting the voice of East Lothian and aiming for an independent Scotland outside of the EU.

mentions.candidate: Kenny MacAskill made the journey to join the SNP.
